content: semplice is italian for simple and these fingerless mitts couldn t be easier whether you work in a chilly office or just need a little extra warmth on the hands in the spring these mitts can be knit up in a matter of hours twisted ribbing on the cuffs looks decorative and helps hold the mitts snug to the wrist without cutting off circulation sportweight yarn keeps the mitts warm without the extra bulk great for quick last minute gifts *note on sizing small should fit teens to small women s hands medium should fit average women and large should fit average men * 8/4/2011 - early versions of the pattern have an error under begin increases for thumb the line should read set up round k1 pm k to 1 stitch before the end of the round **pm k1**
